bib.title: Optical Satellite Image Environment Time Series Applications: Analysis for From Classical Methods to Deep Learning and Beyond
bib.citation: Change Detection and Image Time Series Analysis 2: Supervised Methods, 109, 2021
bib.author: Matthieu MOLINIER and Dino IENCO and Shi QIU and Zhe ZHU
bib.journal: Change Detection and Image Time Series Analysis 2: Supervised Methods
bib.abstract: Satellite image time series (SITS) analysis is increasingly leveraged to address the needs related to environment monitoring, whether it is detecting abrupt changes like deforestation, forest fires or storm damages, gradual environmental trends like forest regrowth or similarly slow ecosystem changes, or both types of changes simultaneously.
